CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Scrolls of Meridian relative to Aura Literary Press?
SRP.A: Scrolls of Meridian is {above} Aura Literary Press in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aura Literary Press relative to Scrolls of Meridian?
SRP.A: Aura Literary Press is {below} Scrolls of Meridian in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total book sales?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aura Literary Press}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total book sales?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Scrolls of Meridian}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Scrolls of Meridian's minimum Book Sales in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Scrolls of Meridian's minimum Book Sales is in {1989}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Scrolls of Meridian's maximum Book Sales in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Scrolls of Meridian's maximum Book Sales is in {1975}.

NC.Q: Was the total Book Sales in 1988 higher or lower than in 1989?
NC.A: The total book sales in 1988 was {lower} than in 1989.

NC.Q: Was the total Book Sales in 1972 higher or lower than in 1984?
NC.A: The total book sales in 1972 was {higher} than in 1984.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1987, was the average total Book Sales higher or lower than between 1983 and 1985?
NC.A: The average total book sales between 1986 and 1987 was {higher} than between 1983 and 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1990, did the total Book Sales experience a larger or smaller change than between 1978 and 1980?
NC.A: The change in total book sales between 1978 and 1990 was {larger} than between 1978 and 1980.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Aura Literary Press} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aura Literary Press and Scrolls of Meridian first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aura Literary Press and Scrolls of Meridian first exchanged leading positions in {1973}.
